pages.text: Pikes are neutral creatures that can be found in $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/swamp/swamp)Swamps$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/river)Rivers$(/l).$(br2)$(l)  Pike Variants:$() $(br)$(li)Amur Pike $(li)Redfin Pickerel $(li)Brown Nothren Pike $(li)Mahogany Northern Pike $(li)Jade Northen Pike $(li)Olive Northen Pike $(li)Spectral Pike $(li)Supercharged Pike.
They will hide in $(l)Pickerelweed$() whick makes them invisible to other fish.

$(li)They will try to hunt other fish, except $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/pufferfish)Pufferfish$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:creatures/upgrade_aquatic/lionfish)Lionfish$(/l).$(br)$(li)On death, if they were holding an item, they will drop it.$(br)$(li)Also they may drop Raw Pike, that can be cooked to get Cooked Pike and drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bone_meal)Bone Meal$(/l) too.
$(li)When a Pike catch a prey, it will carry it in its mouth.
